imdb.plot outline: Real or Fake? is a game show that's hits the streets and asks kids to separate fact from fiction. As contestants try to make it through three wild and wacky rounds, only one can be crowned champion. It's silly. It's nutty. It's a little berserk. But if you think you've got what it takes, then put your smarts to the ultimate test as you answer the question: Is it REAL or is it FAKE?!
imdb.title: Real or Fake?
plot: _Real or Fake?_ (qv) is a game show that hits the streets and asks kids to separate fact from fiction. As contestants try to make it through three wild and wacky rounds, only one can be crowned champion.::Mountain Road Productions
